title: Wife's Pixel Camera's Blue Images
content:
My wife is using the default Pixel camera app. Almost 50% of her shots, more when outdoors, produce nothing but a solid blue screen image. I have reset all settings to default, but honestly couldn't see anything that would cause the effect. First thing I looked for was exposure compensation but doesn't appear to any? Also, what idiot decided that the default for this camera should be "HDR+" mode and worse than that her phone has no way to not make it the default. Thanks in advance.
